english.segment1: Flat face on the ground. Youre unbelievable. A love thats never bound. Its unbelievable. Straight shooter without looking. Ready or not - heres whats cooking. Youve got me fazed. Your grace is unbelievable
english.segment2: You have filled me once again. Steer me straight to be the man. After your own heart
english.segment3: Just as a man so unretrievable. I tried to walk without looking. It's clear to see that you're not joking
